docs.lead_paragraph: MORE potent types of marijuana and alarmingly greater use among young teen-agers require a new attitude of concern toward the substance, some experts believe.

headline.main: Research on Marijuana Finds Many Risks, Some Benefits; Marijuana: Many Risks, Some Benefits Effects on Immune System

docs.abstract: Recent research on marijuana seen indicating need for new attitude of concern toward drug use; Federal drug abuse research cites growing use of imported marijuana which is often 10 times as potent as domestic product used a few years ago; increased use by young teen-agers cited; latest surveys show over 43 million Americans have smoked marijuana, and almost half that number may be regular users; drawing shows harmful and occasionally beneficial effects of drug on various parts of body (L)
docs.snippet: MORE potent types of marijuana and alarmingly greater use among young teen-agers require a new attitude of concern toward the substance, some experts believe.
